title: Joe.Devers.Lone.Wolf.HD.Remastered-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Joe Dever's Lone Wolf HD Remastered (c) Plug In Digital

Release Date: 11/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Adventure

The video game where you are the hero Lone Wolf is back, as a video
game with a brand-new story, a deep combat system, stunning graphics
and much more! Make meaningful choices and carve your own path through
this epic non-linear adventure. Test your strength in dynamic turn
based battles, prove your skill with the lock-picking minigame and
accept the challenge of wits posed by the mysterious Shianti Cube!

For more infos go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/279440/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014
